front.title: Route Distinguisher Outbound Route Filter (RD-ORF) for BGP-4

abstract.t: This draft defines a new Outbound Route Filter (ORF) type, called the Route Distinguisher ORF (RD-ORF). RD-ORF is applicable when the routers do not exchange VPN routing infomation directly (e.g. routers in single-domain connect via Route Reflector, or routers in Option B/ Option C cross-domain scenario).
